subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, like Hideki Matsui 11 years earlier, made his major league debut in a road game against the Blue Jays, creating similar excitement among Japanese fans and news media members.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, like Hideki Matsui 11 years earlier, made his major league debut in a road game against the Blue Jays, creating similar excitement among Japanese fans and news media members.
